This api is to make survey for upsert-cfa-questionnaire-admin

questions.1: How satisfied you are with the time taken to delivery your orders?
questions.2: How would you rate the product quality at the time of delivery?
questions.3: How would you rate the quality of truck (cleanliness/tarpaulin etc.) which was carrying our product?
questions.4: How satisfied are you with the communication and responsiveness of our CFA during the delivery process?
questions.5: How satisfied are you with our speed of resolution of issues like shortage, damage products etc.
questions.6: Overall rating on your experience with CFA
